title: Primetime Draven AA Sound [GAMEPLAY]
body: The Primetime Draven skin used to have the mic throwing sounds whilst auto-attacking and then the satisfying mic smacking sound when you hit a minion. It now just sounds like a normal Draven auto attack.

replies.body:
Hey KaosDaemon, thanks for reaching out about this bud! I'm looking into this one but so far I'm not able to repro it on my end. If you keep experiencing this issue, try a doing a client repair in your settings :) This can sometimes fix issues like this.

Stay awesome and keep swingin' them microphones!
Thank you for looking into it. I appreciate how well you guys reply and attempt to look into these things.
U sorta took a month to reply
and even longer for this one
